cast.overview: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.
cast.title: Barton Fink

cast.original_title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
cast.overview: In New York, armed men hijack a subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. Even if it's paid, how could they get away?
cast.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three

details.biography:
Christopher Murney (born July 20, 1943) is an American actor and vocal artist. Murney has worked on the stage, in television series, and in movies. On television, he is perhaps best known for his role as radio actor Mackie Bloom in Remember WENN (1996 - 1998). Murney has appeared in several films including Slap Shot (1977), The Last Dragon (1985), Maximum Overdrive (1986), The Secret of My Success (1987), and Barton Fink (1991).  Murney has also performed extensive voice acting, including as Chester Cheetah for Cheetos (2006) and in popular video games such as Grand Theft Auto: Vice City Stories (2006) and Red Dead Redemption (2010).

He is the father of singer and actress Julia Murney and actor Patrick Murney.
details.name: Christopher Murney
